node.detail_zh: 患者獨居，無外遊紀錄。8 月 28 日曾因腳腫看私家醫生，醫生發現患者血壓高而轉介患者到急症室，但患者沒有前往。8 月 30 日家人聯絡不到患者而報警求助，及後發現患者已死亡，其遺體被送往公眾殮房，抽取肺部組織檢驗後確診。患者生前會到深水埗茶樓飲茶。
node.detail_en: The patient resides alone and has no travel history. She visited a private practitioner upon developing swollen feet on August 28, and was referred to accident & emergency department due to high blood pressure, but she did not proceed to follow-up. On August 30, her family members contacted the police due to loss of contact with her, and later discovered that she passed away. Her body was transferred to a public mortuary, and the lung tissue sample tested positive for the virus. She used to have dim-sum meals in Sham Shui Po.
